articles.title: Historic Discovery: Twin Titans Clash As NASA Unveils Closest Supermassive Black Hole Duo - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Cores of Two Galaxies Are on a Collision Course For all practical purposes, stars traveling across space never smash into each other. The ratio between a starlike sun's diameter and its distance to the next neighboring star is about 1:10 million. Galaxies do …
articles.content: Astronomers have observed the closest pair of supermassive black holes ever confirmed, located 300 light-years apart within merging galaxies. Using NASA’s Hubble and Chandra telescopes, this discover… [+8588 chars]

articles.title: NASA will proceed with final preps to launch Europa Clipper next month - Ars Technica
articles.description: After a four-month review, NASA says suspect transistors on Europa Clipper are good to go.

articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: Apple updates AirPods Max headphones with a USB-C port and new colors - TechCrunch
articles.description: The updated version of Apple's AirPods Max are still $549, and can be preordered Monday. With a USB-C port, the updated AirPods Max will now match the rest of Apple's product lineup.
articles.content: Apple released a new version of its premium over-the-ear headphones, AirPods Max, on Monday during its 2024 Apple Event. The revamp replaces the AirPods Max’s lightning port with a USB-C port and com… [+1103 chars]
